name: Wildbolt Aspect
description: Every [3.5 - 2.0] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled In to you and take 10%%[x] increased damage for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Soil Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Centipede Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically apply [68 - 89] Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.

name: Aspect of Turbulence
description: Soar casts Vortex at its landing location and deals [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of the Orange Herald
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [5.0 - 13.0]%% chance to reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 2 seconds. Can only happen once per Skill cast.

name: Aspect of the Cursed Aura
description: A dark aura surrounds you, inflicting Decrepify and Iron Maiden on enemies who touch it. Curses inflicted this way spread to surrounding targets every [2.5 - 0.3] seconds and last 4 seconds outside of the aura.

name: Aspect of Binding Morass
description: Close enemies or those you deal indirect damage to are Slowed by [30 - 70]%% for 3 seconds. You deal 20%%[x] increased damage to Slowed enemies.

name: Aspect of Apprehension
description: Once an enemy is Slowed by at least 80%%, they also become Feared for 3 seconds. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage to Feared enemies.

name: Aspect of Concussive Strikes
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy has up to a 20%% chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.You deal [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage to Dazed enemies.

name: Menacing Aspect
description: Scourge continuously affects enemies around you for [5.0 - 9.0] seconds.

name: Stormshifter's Aspect
description: While Hurricane is active, gain +5 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

name: Aspect of Occult Dominion
description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

name: Triumphant
description: +[10.0 - 20.0]%% Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Killing an Elite

name: Craven Aspect
description: You gain [25 - 45]%%[x] increased Movement Speed when moving away from Slowed or Chilled enemies.

name: Blood Getter's Aspect
description: Your Skeletal Priests now also empower you at [55 - 75]%% effectiveness.

name: Aspect of the Bounding Conduit
description: Teleport's Cooldown is reduced by [1.0 - 3.0] seconds. After Teleporting, Crackling Energy hits 2 additional enemies for 5 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Void
description: Blight's defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.

name: Aspect of Fortune
description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by [10 - 30]%%[+] while you have a Barrier active.

name: Aspect of Reactive Armor
description: Gain 10%%[+] Block Chance. Blocking an attack from a Close enemy has a [30 - 70]%% chance to cast a free Concussive Stomp at them.

name: Aspect of Metamorphosis
description: When you Evade you turn into a cloud of bats, becoming Unstoppable for 2.5 seconds. Enemies along your path take 300 Physical damage and are inflicted with Vampiric Curse.  Evade's Cooldown is increased by [10.0 - 4.0] seconds.

name: Sticker-thought Aspect
description: Gain [508 - 1,270] Thorns while Channeling and for 3 seconds afterwards.

name: Torturous Aspect
description: Iron Maiden is now also a Darkness Skill and deals Shadow damage. Enemies have a [10 - 30]%% chance to be Stunned for 1 second when they take damage from Iron Maiden.

name: Aspect of Audacity
description: When there are at least 5 Close enemies, Stun them for [2.5 - 4.5] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

name: Aspect of Frosty Strides
description: While below [45 - 60]%% Life, Evade Freezes Close enemies, deals 450 Cold damage to them, and makes them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Assistance
description: Your Reinforcement Cooldown is reduced by [23 - 33]%%[x]. After casting your Ultimate Skill, your Reinforcement Mercenary is called. This cannot occur more than once each 30 seconds.

name: Tumbling
description: Evade Grants +100%% Movement Speed for 1.5 Seconds

name: Aspect of Fleet Wings
description: Razor Wings is now also an Incarnate Skill with:Passive: You are Unhindered.Active: You gain [15 - 35]%%[+] increased Movement Speed per active Razor Wing.

name: Aspect of the Firebird
description: Gain the Flame Shield Enchantment for free. When Flame Shield activates, Meteorites fall around you dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage.

name: Aphotic Aspect
description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow damage and have a [5.0 - 25.0]%% chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

name: Aspect of Shared Misery
description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [35 - 55]%% chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

name: Exploiter's Aspect
description: You have 20%%[+] increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are Unstoppable, you deal [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage to them.

name: Inexorable Reaper's Aspect
description: Sever now dashes you forward to attack instead. It is now also a Mobility Skill and costs no Essence, but has a [13.5 - 3.5] second Cooldown.

name: Aspect of Tenuous Agility
description: Gain [5.0 - 20.0]%%[+] Movement Speed. This bonus is doubled if you haven't used a Defensive Skill in the last 8 seconds.

name: Frostbitten Aspect
description: Enemies hit by your Stun Grenades have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to be Frozen for 2 seconds. You deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage against Frozen or Stunned enemies.

name: Aspect of Haste
description: Every second while moving gain [10 - 30]%%[+] Bonus Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds, up to [30 - 90]%%[+].

name: Eluding Aspect
description: Becoming Injured while Crowd Controlled grants you Unstoppable for 4 seconds. This effect has a [40 - 20] second Cooldown.

name: Wind Striker Aspect
description: Critical Strikes grant [8.5 - 19.0]%%[+] Movement Speed for 1 second, up to 6 seconds.

name: Luckbringer Aspect
description: Gain [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Lucky Hit Chance while all damage bonuses from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive are active.

name: Aspect of Creeping Mist
description: Gain [20.0 - 40.0]%% Evade Cooldown Reduction. You can now Evade during Blood Mist, traveling twice as far. Entering or exiting Blood Mist resets your Evade Cooldown.

name: Aspect of Slaughter
description: You gain 20%% Movement Speed. Lose this bonus for [5.0 - 2.0] seconds after taking damage from a Close enemy.

name: Tumbling
description: Evade Grants +25%% Movement Speed for 1.5 Seconds

name: Aspect of Quicksand
description: Damage from Earth Skills Slow enemies hit by [20 - 60]%% for 5 seconds.

name: Aspect of Perpetual Stomping
description: Damaging an enemy with Kick or Ground Stomp resets Leap's Cooldown.

name: Aspect of the Unholy Tether
description: Casting Golem's active Skill creates a bond between you for 6 seconds. While the bond is active, both of you are Unhindered and gain [25.0 - 45.0]%% Movement Speed.

name: Aspect of Anemia
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging Bleeding or Vulnerable enemies has up to a [15 - 35]%% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

name: Mired Sharpshooter's  Aspect
description: Caltrops is now also a Marksman Skill that also throws [5 - 25] piercing daggers over its duration, each dealing 15 Shadow damage and applying Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Symbiotic Aspect
description: When the Nature's Fury Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non-Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by [2.5 - 6.0] seconds.

name: Flamewalker's Aspect
description: Coming in contact with your Firewall grants you [10 - 30]%%[+] Movement Speed for 6 seconds.

name: Mangler's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to a Vulnerable enemy has up to a [30 - 50]%% chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.

name: Ghostwalker Aspect
description: While Unstoppable and for 4 seconds after, you gain [10 - 30]%%[+] increased Movement Speed and are Unhindered.

name: Hectic Aspect
description: After casting 5 Basic Skills, one of your active Cooldowns is reduced by [1.0 - 2.5] seconds.

name: Ravager's Aspect
description: Shadow Step has an additional Charge. Killing an enemy with Shadow Step refunds a Charge and increases the damage of Shadow Step by [4.5 - 14.5]%%[x] for 2 seconds, up to [27 - 87]%%[x].

name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [15 - 35]%% chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 2 seconds. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Smoke Grenades reduce Dash's Cooldown by [0.50 - 0.70] seconds for each enemy hit, up to [1.50 - 2.10] seconds.

name: Weapon Master's Aspect
description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge.Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [40 - 60]%% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

name: Aspect of Binding Embers
description: Flame Shield grants you Unhindered for its duration. Enemies you move through while Flame Shield is active are Immobilized for [1.5 - 3.5] seconds.

name: Aspect of Forward Momentum
description: Knocking Back an enemy grants you [25 - 45]%% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Ballistic Aspect
description: When you have Fortify your Earth Skills gain +2 Ranks.

name: Aspect of Sky Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Eagle Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to move with you and explode for [68 - 78] Lightning damage when you Evade.

name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20%% per second. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

name: Evade_Attack_Reset_ALWAYSMAX
description: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by [0.6 - 0.8] Seconds

name: Aspect of Explosive Verve
description: Your Grenade Skills count as Trap Skills. Whenever you arm a Trap or drop Grenades, you gain [10 - 30]%%[+] increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Coldbringer's Aspect
description: Every 8 seconds, your Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals [135 - 180] Cold damage and continuously Chills enemies for 8%% over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Rushing Wilds
description: Casting a Companion Skill grants you [5.0 - 20.0]%%[+] Movement Speed for 5 seconds, up to [15.0 - 60.0]%%[+].

name: Virulent Aspect
description: When Rabies infects an enemy, reduce its Cooldown by [0.20 - 1.00] seconds. This Cooldown reduction is tripled when infecting Elite enemies.

name: Aspect of Nebulous Brews
description: Using a Healing Potion grants [35 - 55]%%[+] Movement Speed for 3 seconds, and you may now drink them while at full Life.Every 20 meters you travel, you spawn a Healing Potion.

name: Aspect of the Agile Wolf
description: Shred gains a 4th dash attack that hits all surrounding enemies, deals [20 - 60]%%[x] increased damage, and Knocks Down enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Dark Howl
description: Debilitating Roar is now a Werewolf Skill. In addition, Debilitating Roar will Immobilize Poisoned enemies for [2.5 - 4.5] seconds.

name: Ironclaw
description: +[11.5 - 16.5]%% Total Armor while in Werewolf Form

name: Aspect of Singed Extremities
description: After Immobilize or Stun wears off, enemies are Slowed by [45 - 65]%% for 4 seconds.

name: Aspect of Momentum
description: After you Evade, your next Core Skill dashes to your target and does [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Explosive Mist
description: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by [0.1 - 0.8] seconds.

name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind periodically Pulls enemies to you.

name: Hulking Aspect
description: Your Golem has a [2 - 18]%% chance to reduce its active Cooldown by 2 seconds and a [1.0 - 9.0]%% chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

name: UNIQUE_INHERENT_Evade_MovementSpeed_VeryLonger
description: Evade Grants +100%% Movement Speed for 3.0 Seconds

name: Weaving
description: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.2 Seconds

name: Charged Aspect
description: Collecting Crackling Energy increases your Movement Speed by [15 - 30]%%[+] for 8 seconds.
